name: sendgrid-eventkit-lambda-mongodb

scripts.update-staging: zip -r ./lambda.zip index.js src/ node_modules/ && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name sendgrid-eventkit-testing --zip-file fileb://./lambda.zip && rm ./lambda.zip
scripts.update-production-ignoring-travis-ci: zip -r ./lambda.zip index.js src/ node_modules/ && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name sendgrid-eventkit --zip-file fileb://./lambda.zip && rm ./lambda.zip

description: lambda functions for sendgrid integration with mongo
author: SGT
